name: World Championship Baseball
description:
Back of Box - Intellivision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Wearing blue uniforms, your home team is up against the fabulous computer-controlled red visitors, or against any "red team" that happens to be in town! These are possibly the MOST REALISTIC BASEBALL PLAYERS you're ever going to manage! Watch the pitcher throw a fast-breaking curve outside, or a fireball right in the middle. Swing that bat all the way for a home run, or drop a bunt. Overrun 1st base! Slide into 2nd or 3rd! Take chances, steal! Run! Run! WATCH OUT!–a fly ball–DOUBLE PLAY!!

  • For one or two players!
  • Exciting Big League Baseball action to keep you entertained for a lifetime!
  • Nine men on each team. Most professional rules observed. Fielders go after fly balls to catch them! Baserunners tease, steal, and rowdily slide into bases. This is FUN!
  • Real audience effects with cheers and whistles. Hear 'em go wild after a Home Run!!
  • Score the most runs in 9 regulation innings, or extra innings to a decision! "YER OUT!" shouts the "ump." 7 to 6–you WIN!
